disShow.title: Document block fields
disShow.description: Enter the field types to display (mSelect, number, date, text, mAsset, checkbox, phone, url, email, created, updated). Leave blank to show all supported fields.

disShowBlock.title: Regular block fields
disShowBlock.description: Enter the field types to display (mSelect, number, date, text, mAsset, checkbox, phone, url, email, created, updated). Leave blank to show all supported fields.

hiddenFields.title: Hidden field names
hiddenFields.description: Comma-separated field names to hide, for example: Password, Private Notes, Internal Remarks.
hiddenFields.logCleared: Hidden fields cleared; all fields will be shown.

dateFormat.title: Date display format
dateFormat.description: Select how date fields are formatted.

checkboxStyle.title: Checkbox style
checkboxStyle.description: Choose how checkbox fields are rendered.

showTimestamps.title: Show timestamp fields
showTimestamps.description: Toggle display of created and updated timestamp fields.

forceShowFields.title: Force display fields
forceShowFields.description: Comma-separated field names to display even when their value is empty.
forceShowFields.logCleared: Force display fields cleared; placeholders disabled.

maxDisplayLength.title: Max display length
maxDisplayLength.description: Maximum characters to display before showing an ellipsis. Range: 10-200.
maxDisplayLength.rangeWarning: Display length should be between 10 and 200 characters. Reset to default (30).

fieldColorMap.title: Field text color (JSON)
fieldColorMap.description: Customize text colors for each field type. Supported: mSelect, number, date, text, mAsset, checkbox, phone, url, email, created, updated.

fieldBgColorMap.title: Field background color (JSON)
fieldBgColorMap.description: Customize background colors for each field type (lighter colors recommended).

fieldValueColorMap.title: Field value colors (JSON)
fieldValueColorMap.description: Override colors by specific values. Format: { "value": "#textColor" } or { "value": { "color": "#textColor", "bg": "#background" } }.

previewColorDemo.title: Preview
previewColorDemo.description: Preview the current type/background/value colors. Updates automatically.
previewColorDemo.priorityHint: Priority: Value colors > Type text color / Type background color

autoLoadedInterval.title: Auto refresh interval (seconds)
autoLoadedInterval.description: Interval for automatically triggering loaded(). 0 = off; >=5 enables refresh (values <5 are raised to 5).
